19520.en:
<start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>Nooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo
oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo! I
will not retreat! Run away!<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19520.ja:
<start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>「ヌオオオオオオオオーーーーーッ！！
　我ラは　退かヌ！　逃げヌ！<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19520.ko:
<start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>: 으오오오오오오오오~~~~!!
　우리는 물러서지 않는다! 도망치지 않는다!<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19520.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>哇哦！
我们绝不后退！绝不逃走！<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19520.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>唔喔喔喔喔喔喔喔喔──────！！
我們絕不後退！絕不逃走！<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19521.en:
<start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>Nothing can stop me! No one can stop
my march.<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19521.ja:
<start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>「何者モ　我ラを止めラレヌゥゥゥ！！
　我ラの進軍ヲ　阻む者ハ……<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19521.ko:
<start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>: 그 누구도 우리를 막을 수 없다아아아!!
　우리의 진군을 막는 자는……<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19521.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>没人能阻止我们！
胆敢阻止我们进军的人……<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19521.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>沒人能阻止我們──！！
膽敢阻止我們進軍的人……<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19522.en:
<shake_camera 33><start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>Eight ki, eight ki, eight ki, eight
ki, eight ki, eight ki, eight ki,
eight ki, eight ki!<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19522.ja: <shake_camera 33><start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>「八つ裂キ　八つ裂キ　八つ裂キーーーッ！！<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19522.ko: <shake_camera 33><start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>: 갈기갈기, 갈기갈기, 갈기갈기 찢어 주마~~!!<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19522.zh-Hans: <shake_camera 33><start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>全部大卸八块，大卸八块，大卸八块！<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19522.zh-Hant: <shake_camera 33><start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>全部大卸八塊、大卸八塊、大卸八塊────！！<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19523.en: <start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>Noooooooooo. Oh no lee ee.<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19523.ja:
<start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>「ヌオオオオオォォォ……………。
　お…おのレエエエ……。<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19523.ko:
<start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>: 으오오오오오오오오…………….
　네… 네 이노오오옴…….<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19523.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>啊啊啊……
可……可恶啊……<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19523.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>唔喔喔喔喔喔喔喔喔………………
可、可惡啊……<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19524.en:
<start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>I hate Fostail. I will never forget
this hatred.<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19524.ja:
<start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>「憎キ　フォステイル……。
　こノ恨み　我ラは忘れヌゾ……。<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19524.ko:
<start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>: 역적 포스테일…….
　이 원한, 우리는 결코 잊지 않을 것이다…….<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19524.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>可恶的福斯迪尔……
这笔账，我们永世不忘……<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19524.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m04904 _normal m00001>可恨的福斯迪爾……
這筆帳，我們永世不忘……<stop_lip_animation m04904 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000433.en:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>The ghost soldier mumbled a final
grudge against Fostail. Hmmm.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000433.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>「……亡霊兵士は　最期に
　フォステイルへの恨みを　つぶやきました。
　うーん……。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000433.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>: ……망령 병사는 마지막에
　포스테일을 원망하는 말을 중얼거렸죠.
　흐음…….<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000433.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>……亡灵士兵在最后诉说着
对福斯迪尔的仇恨。
嗯……<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000433.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>……亡靈士兵在最後訴說著
對福斯迪爾的仇恨。
嗯……<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000434.en:
I guess the dream I had of the Ghost King attacking Megistris Castle, crying out for the overthrow of
Fostail, foretold the near future.
19000434.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>「やはり　亡霊王が　打倒フォステイルを叫び
　メギストリス城を襲うという　ぼくの見た夢は
　近い将来を　予知していたのか……。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000434.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>: 역시 망령왕이 타도 포스테일을 외치며
　메기스투리스성을 습격하는 걸 본 내 꿈은
　가까운 미래를 예견했던 건가…….<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000434.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>我梦到亡灵王喊着打倒福斯迪尔，
袭击麦奇斯翠丝城，
果然都是在预言不久的将来会发生的事吗……<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000434.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>我夢到亡靈王喊著打倒福斯迪爾，
襲擊麥奇斯翠絲城，
果然都是在預言不久將來會發生的事嗎……<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000435.en:
Five hundred years ago, Fostail was called the ''magician genius'' for his ability to defeat monsters and help
his people.
19000435.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>「……５００年前　フォステイルは
　各地で　魔物を倒し　民を助け
　天才魔術師と　呼ばれていました。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000435.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>: ……500년 전 포스테일은
　각지에서 마물을 쓰러뜨리고 사람들을 구한
　천재 마술사라고 불렸습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000435.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>……５００年前，
福斯迪尔在各地打倒怪物、拯救人民，
曾有过天才魔术师之称。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000435.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>……５００年前，
福斯迪爾在各地打倒怪物、拯救人民，
曾有過天才魔術師之稱。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000436.en:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>In recognition of his service, he was
appointed to the kingdom of that time
and eventually became its king.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000436.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>「その活躍が認められ　当時の王国に仕官し
　やがて　この国の王となったのですが……<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000436.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>: 그 활약을 인정받아 당시 왕국의 관직에 올라
　결국 이 나라의 왕이 되었는데……<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000436.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>当时他的活跃表现得到了认可，
成为了王国的官员，最终当上了国王……<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000436.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>當時他的活躍表現得到了認可，
成為了王國的官員，最終當上了國王……<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000437.en:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>How Fostail became king is not well
understood.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000437.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>「フォステイルが王となった　いきさつについては
　じつは　よくわかっていないのです。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000437.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>: 포스테일이 왕이 된 과정에 대해서는
　사실 잘 알려져 있지 않습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000437.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>但是关于福斯迪尔成为国王的经过，
其实我并不是很清楚。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000437.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>但是關於福斯迪爾成為國王的經過，
其實我並不是很清楚。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000438.en:
Maybe he defeated the Ghost King, who was an evil man, and saved the people. The Ghost King may still hold a grudge
against him.
19000438.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>「もしかしたら　悪人だった亡霊王を倒し
　国民を救ったのかもしれません。亡霊王は　今も
　それを恨んでいる……というところでしょうか。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000438.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>: 어쩌면 악인이었던 망령왕을 무찌르고
　국민을 구했을 수도 있죠. 망령왕은 여전히
　그걸 원망하고 있다……고 봐야 하지 않을까요.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000438.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>或许就是因为他打倒了邪恶的亡灵王，
拯救了国民吧。而亡灵王直到现在
也还是对他恨之入骨……大概就是这样吧。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000438.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>或許就是因為他打倒了邪惡的亡靈王，
拯救了國民吧。而亡靈王直到現在
也還是對他恨之入骨……大概就是這樣吧。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000439.en:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>I'm sorry. Oh, by the way, I haven't
thanked you yet. Please accept this.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000439.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>「……っと　すいません。
　そういえば　お礼が　まだでしたね。
　どうぞ　これを受け取ってください。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000439.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>: ……이런, 죄송합니다.
　그러고 보니 아직 보답을 못 드렸군요.
　자, 이거 받으세요.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000439.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>……对不起。
说起来，我还没给你谢礼吧。
请收下这个。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000439.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>……啊，抱歉。
說起來，我還沒給你謝禮吧。
這是謝禮，請你收下。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000440.en:
Yes, it is! There may be some Fostail history left behind in the castle, chronicling his life from his service
to the kingdom 500 years ago until he became king.
19000440.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>「そうだ！　５００年前　王国に仕官してから
　王となるまでを記した　フォステイル史が
　城に　残されているかもしれません。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000440.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>: 아! 500년 전 왕국의 관직에 오른 후로
　왕이 되기까지를 기록한 포스테일의 역사가
　성에 남아 있을지도 몰라요.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000440.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>对了！城堡里好像保存着一本
记载着５００年前福斯迪尔
从入国为官到登上王位的经过的历史书。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000440.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>對了！有本福斯迪爾史記載著
５００年前福爾迪斯自入國為官到登上王位的經過，
或許還留在城內。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000441.en:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>If we find it, we will know what
happened between Fostail and the Ghost
King.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000441.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>「それが見つかれば　フォステイルと
　亡霊王との間で何があったか　わかるでしょう。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000441.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>: 그걸 찾으면 포스테일과 망령왕 사이에
　무슨 일이 있었는지 알 수 있겠죠.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000441.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>要是能找到它的话，
就能知道福斯迪尔和亡灵王之间发生过什么了。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000441.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>只要能找到那本史書，應該就能得知
福斯迪爾與亡靈王之間發生過什麼吧。<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
